subject: Re: Loo..king fo.r frien.d?
body:
Hire,
i am here sitting in the internet caffe. Found your email and
decided to write. I might be cominga to your pla!ce in 14 days, 
so I decided to email you. May be we can meet? I am 25 y.o.
girl. I havae a picture if you want. No need to reply here as 
this is not my email. Write me at omhib@BounceEmail.info
